original_title: Sri Lanka bonds close steady, rupee 310.00/313.00 to dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka bonds were steady at close, dealers said while the spot US dollar closed higher at 310.00/312.00 rupees.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed at 14.50/60 percent steady from 14.50/15.00 from opening.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 closed at 15.00/40 percent, up from 14.75/.25 percent from opening.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 closed at 15.25/15.50 percent up from 14.75//15.50 percent from opening. (Colombo/ July 06/2023 – spot rupee is 310/312)
